Test.Name: Profile T is supported; Only mandatary
Test.Description:
MaxPullPoints="2";
Media2 Service\Video\H.264, H.265 are supported - one is enough
Imaging Service\Tampering Events\Image Too Blurry, Image Too Dark, Image Too Bright, Global Scene Change are supported - one is enough
Relay Outputs, Digital Inputs skipped
